Echoes of Scotland
Birtley, County Durham Promoted by Birtley League of the Cross Band
1st prize £9. 2nd prize £5. 3rd prize £3. 4th prize £1.10s divided between Willington and Peases West.
March contest 1st South Pelaw, 2nd divided between New Brancepeth and Chester-le-Street.
8 bands competed.
Feb. 13, 2012, 11:57 a.m. April 1, 2014, 11:11 a.m.
